title: Total Immersion 4 Strokes Made EZ L7 Hand-Lead Sweet Spot - iPAD
description:
Total Immersion 4 Strokes Made EZ L7 Hand-Lead Sweet Spot - iPAD OPTIMIZED!

Total Immersion Swimming "Four Strokes Made Easy" contains many of the same drills as "Freestyle Made Easy" but presented in a different way with different swimmers.

This great stuff has been made EASIER to master by BREAKING IT DOWN INTO INDIVIDUAL LESSONS AND DRILLS! -- and viewable on your iPAD next to the pool!

A brilliant swimming technique that makes water your friend and maximizes efficiency, effectiveness, balance, symmetry, enjoyment, beauty.

Technique matters.

And being able to SWIM ALL DAY could save your life sometime ...

Watching an entire DVD in a linear fashion (or listening to one of Terry Laughlin's lectures or presentations) cannot enable mastery of the lessons or any core principles.

The rate he dishes out his info on video, in lecture or in presentations is always too much too fast. It just numbs the mind.

Because each lesson builds on the previous, it's ineffective and pointless to roll along watching the DVD.

Outside of the water, individual lessons on the iPad work great for very young swimmers, particularly with water babies.

Tap, tap, tap, watch the drill on the iPad, get in the water, apply -- no DVD, no DVD player, no searching for the drill you want.

TIF = Total Immersion Freestyle, L = lesson, D = drill, TIFSF = Total Immersion Four Strokes: Freestyle, TIFSFB = Total Immersion Four Strokes: Freestyle-Backstroke

Because both freestyle and backstroke are "Long Axis" (LA) strokes they are dealt with at the same time in the TIFSFB drills.

V: m4v     H264/MPEG4    948 x 720     7055k     29.97fps
A: mpeg4aac     6807k     243k     44100

Color corrected, light levels sometimes adjusted, background noise removed when original was too extreme. Onscreen text has been added to the progressions because -- again -- too much too fast for us folks of only normal IQ.

And we'll probably put together a VOCABULARY list for all these because -- GUESS WHAT? -- little kids do NOT understand everything Coach Terry is rattling on about.

THANKS FOR SEEDING!

Our Entire iPad Optimized Collection (each a separate download):

TIF L1D1 Balance on Your Back
TIF L1D2 Sweet Spot

TIF L3D11 ZipperSwitch

TIF L4D14 Momentum Drills Push off to Skating
TIF L5 Breathing 101
TIF L6 Freestyle Turns Made Easy
TIF L7 Swimming Fast
TIF L8 Two Heads are Better than One
Swimming - Fingertip Wall Drill (by Marc Evans, not TI)
TIFSF L1 Master Basic Balance

TIFSF L4 Active Balance - Looking UP
TIFSF L5 Active Balance - Looking DOWN
